live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
62944.summary: Some customers in the City Centre of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
62944.title: June 21 - Winnipeg (City Centre) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
